attributes.label: Internal Conflict (obstacles)
attributes.prompt: Why is your protagonist hesitant to strive for her goals? What (emotionally) makes her falter?

attributes.label: External Conflict (obstacles)
attributes.prompt: What stands in the way of your protagonist’s goals? What will happen to her if she fails?

attributes.label: Internal Higher Conflict (obstacles heighten)
attributes.prompt: Why should your protagonist turn back now? Why doesn’t she? What’s at stake?

attributes.label: External Higher Conflict (obstacles heighten)
attributes.prompt: Who or what is trying to stop your protagonist? Why?

attributes.label: Internal Highest Conflict (obstacles intensify)
attributes.prompt: What makes your protagonist realize the unavoidable importance of her original goal? What gives it new meaning?

attributes.label: External Highest Conflict (obstacles intensify)
attributes.prompt: How does the antagonist get the best of your protagonist? What could make it worse? What happens to make her believe that there is no way to win?

attributes.label: Internal Point of No Return (stakes)
attributes.prompt: What happens to change your protagonist so that she’ll never be the same again?

attributes.label: External Point of No Return (stakes)
attributes.prompt: What makes it impossible for your protagonist to go back, to give up?

attributes.label: Darkest Hour
attributes.prompt: What is the worst possible thing that could happen to your protagonist?

attributes.label: Turning Point
attributes.prompt: How does your protagonist realize she must continue to fight? How does she decide to risk everything? What new approach or idea has she come up with to battle on?
